scripts.start: npm run build && npm run start:server
scripts.build: npm run build:client && npm run build:admin
scripts.preinstall: npm install --prefix emsi-client && npm install --prefix emsi-admin
scripts.scss:rebuild: npm rebuild --prefix emsi-client node-sass && npm rebuild --prefix emsi-admin node-sass
scripts.docker:start: npm run docker:cleanup && npm run docker:image && npm run docker:container
scripts.docker:cleanup: docker stop emsi || true && docker container rm emsi || true && docker image rm emsi-img || true
scripts.docker:restart: docker stop emsi || true && docker container rm emsi || true && npm run docker:container
